title: unistalled
body:
third promo there was a afk or feeder

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1687271960/210185679?tab=overview
its like riot  says "This guy won everything TIME TO GIVE HIM THE WORST PLAYERS EVER!"

i never ever get these type of players until im in promos which tells ya somethin
